title: Tram derails in Milan, leaving two dead and dozens injured
summary_full: The crowded tram was travelling in the centre of Milan at rush hour when it appeared to crash into the side of a building.
summary_public: The crowded tram was travelling in the centre of Milan at rush hour when it appeared to crash into the side of a building.
